46465.summary: Some customers south of the Rainbow Park in Prince George] are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
